Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 40 **Perception** +21 **Languages** [Minatan](/Languages.aspx?ID=90), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43), [Wayang](/Languages.aspx?ID=91) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +30, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +27, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +28, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +32 **Str** +4 **Dex** +5 **Con** +4 **Int** +0 **Wis** +0 **Cha** +5 **Items** [greater alchemist's fires](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75) (3), _[bracers of armor I](/Equipment.aspx?ID=416)_, _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38)_, _[greater sturdy shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=327)_ (Hardness 15, HP 120, BT 60) with a _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shield boss](/Weapons.aspx?ID=41)_ --- **AC** 37 (39 with shield raised) **Fort** +25 **Ref** +28 **Will** +21 **HP** 275 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32)** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _scimitar_ +31 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)), **Damage** 2d6+12 slashing plus 1d6 flaming **Melee** _shield boss_ +31 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 2d6+12 bludgeoning **Ranged** greater alchemist's fire +32 ([splash 3 fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 3d8+3 fire plus 3 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) **Quick Draw** The battle dancer Interacts to draw a weapon and Strikes with it. **Shield Drum** The battle dancer [Raises a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98), then [Demoralizes](/Actions.aspx?ID=53). **Threatening Dance** The battle dancer either Steps and then [Performs](/Actions.aspx?ID=59), or Performs and then Steps. Compare the [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) result to the Will DC of one creature in the battle dancer's reach. **Critical Success** The creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to all attacks until the start of the battle dancer's next turn. **Success** The creature is flat-footed to the next attack by a creature other than the battle dancer before the start of the battle dancer's next turn.
